title: Understanding $$f(x-a)$$
text: For some value a, $$f(x-a)$$ means that f(x) is translated to the right by a units. Similarly, $$f{\left(x+a\right)}$$ means that f(x) is translated to the left by a units.
speech: For some value a,  f of, parentheses x minus a,   means that f(x) is translated to the right by a units. Similarly, , f of, parentheses x plus a,   means that f(x) is translated to the left by a units.

means that f(x) is translated to the left by a units.

title: Understanding $$f(x-a)$$
text: Since a is $$-2$$, $$f{\left(x+2\right)}$$ means that the graph is translated left by $$2$$.
speech: Since a is  minus 2 , , f of, parentheses x plus 2,   means that the graph is translated left by  2 .
pacedSpeech: means that the graph is translated left by   2

title: Understanding $$a f{\left(x\right)}$$
text: For some value a not equal to $$0$$, $$a f{\left(x\right)}$$ means that f(x) is stretched vertically by a. Similarly, $$\frac{f{\left(x\right)}}{a}$$ means that f(x) is compressed vertically by a.
speech: For some value a not equal to  0 ,  a f of x,  means that f(x) is stretched vertically by a. Similarly, , fraction, f of x, over a,   means that f(x) is compressed vertically by a.

means that f(x) is stretched vertically by a. Similarly,  , fraction, f of x, over a,
means that f(x) is compressed vertically by a.

title: Understanding $$a f{\left(x\right)}$$
text: Since a is $$3$$, $$3f{\left(x+2\right)}$$ means that the graph is stretched vertically by $$3$$.
speech: Since a is  3 ,  3, f of, parentheses x plus 2,   means that the graph is stretched vertically by  3 .
pacedSpeech: means that the graph is stretched vertically by   3

title: Understanding $$f{\left(x\right)}+a$$
text: For some value a, $$f{\left(x\right)}+a$$ means that f(x) is translated up by a units. Similarly, $$f(x)-a$$ means that f(x) is translated down by a units.
speech: For some value a,  f of x plus a  means that f(x) is translated up by a units. Similarly,  f of x, minus a  means that f(x) is translated down by a units.
pacedSpeech: For some value a,   f of x plus a
means that f(x) is translated up by a units. Similarly,   f of x, minus a
means that f(x) is translated down by a units.

title: Understanding $$f{\left(x\right)}+a$$
text: Since a is $$-5$$, $$3f{\left(x+2\right)}-5$$ means that the graph is translated down by $$5$$.
speech: Since a is  minus 5 ,  3, f of, parentheses x plus 2,  minus 5  means that the graph is translated down by  5 .
